metadata.name: #001 - SJC Works
metadata.description:
Pull your collection through the web3 portal into the real world. Smell the city and feel the leather between your PFP’s buttocks.

A bid here will start a conversation with Sam to see what you want to highlight in your animation. Then I’ll back away slowly and chug coffees in order to manically beat my creative brain into submission. 

I’ll focus on cinematic lighting, realistic environments and character development. Your PFP will be bringin’ sexy back with a marching band.


Turn around time 
~ 3 weeks


Things to keep in mind  
- My work on a project is as a 3D artist, Unreal generalist, cinematic director and storyteller. Depending on the focus of the story, additional freelance help may be required for character art and detailed simulation work. However all motion capture work is included in the price.

- I like to share my dailies so we don’t go off course early. In this fashion I can allow several changes to shots I’ve not yet completed and smaller changes to “beta” completed scenes. Text scenes may be updated right until the final test preview.
